title: Hero Dualie Replicas
paragraphs: The Hero Dualie Replicas are a main weapon in Splatoon 2. They are a variant of the Splat Dualies with the same stats but with the visual design of the Hero Dualies.
The Hero Dualie Replicas are identical in appearance to the Level 1 Hero Dualies. They are mainly black and yellow with blue highlights.

The Hero Dualie Replicas are visually identical to the Level 1 Hero Dualies but are simply re-skinned Splat Dualies. Therefore, unlike the switchable sub weapons of the Hero Dualies, it comes with Burst Bombs and Tenta Missiles. To unlock the Hero Dualie Replicas, the player must complete every level with the Hero Dualies in Octo Canyon, in which they become available for purchase at Ammo Knights.
- Hero weapons, with the Hero Dualie Replicas in the middle right
- The Hero Dualie Replicas are used by the Inkling on the left
For competitive tips about the Hero Dualie Replicas
Note: the strategy advice for the Splat Dualies also applies to the Hero Dualie Replicas, so they share the same strategy page.
